Articles.Content: Stumbled upon this game last night, although many, many months ago a coworker mentioned it and we thought it was very cool. Anyway, last night was very late night once I got the demo. I think I'm in for the long haul. Looking forward to tapping the knowledge base. TTFN!
Hello, and welcome to the forum. You won't be sorry if you upgrade to the full game. (And I don't get a share of that, so it's advice rather than a sales-pitch.)

Welcome aboard, Mr. Pointy End! The forums are a fantastic source of information and advice for new players such as yourself, and nearly all who try the demo go on to the full game.

Happy explodi- er, launching!
Lucky you! I wish I could discover KSP for the first time, again. Welcome!
